responses.message: **milad** blessed you with **$1000** don't waste it!
**bongo** gave you ** $200** coins after you **danced for him.** :dancer:
the **local cop** gave you  **$250** coins after you **danced** for him. :dancer:
**Lebron James** gave you **$500** after you told him you were **sick**.
**Donald Trump** gave you **ten coins** and a get out of jail** free** card. :nauseated_face:
**Lil Nas X** gave you **$666** and his **custom shoes**. :japanese_ogre:
you **endorsed bongo** in a Discord server and **earned $500**.
the **restaurant waiter** let you take **extra mints**, and you sold them for **$50**.
you convinced someone to** buy a "magic rock"** from you for **$100.**
you secretly **popped someones tire**, then offered to fix it for them for **$500**.
you did a** silly magic trick **for some gullible kids and** earned $2.**
you won an** anti-beauty contest **with a **$500 **prize and a fake medal you sold for $10.
your** pet monkey** gave you **$60 **after he saw the letter from the bank.
your **mom **felt bad for you and gave you her **entire life savings, $69**.
**Elon Musk** was feeling generous so he gave you **$6969 **on March 20. <:elon:836845729339277312>
local **drug addict** wrote** $420 on a check instead of his forhead**. smh... kids these days.
